news.title: MetaMask Integrates StarkWare Into First-Of-Its-Kind ZK-Rollup Snap
news.subtitle: MetaMask Snaps allows developers to expand the capabilities of MetaMask and enable a myriad of features, including connecting to non-EVM networks like StarkNet.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Until now, StarkNet hasn‚Äôt been directly compatible with MetaMask due to its use of a different address and account format than Ethereum. In other words: non-EVM compatible. This Layer 2 snap is the first of its kind to enable ZK-rollup support, giving users wider access to permissionless decentralized networks for fast, low-cost applications. 

We have also developed a StarkNet dapp to install the snap in addition to viewing, managing, and adding StarkNet-based tokens. The keys and transaction approvals will be managed within MetaMask Flask. The StarkNet snap derives StarkNet keys from your MetaMask Secret Recovery Phrase without having access to your MetaMask data and allows you to manage assets on StarkNet. 

MetaMask Snaps allows developers to build on top of MetaMask and customize it to their dapp‚Äôs desire. The new StarkNet snap allows developers to deploy StarkNet accounts, make transactions on StarkNet, and interact with StarkNet smart contracts. It can be connected with any dapp to access StarkNet and developers can experiment integrating their dapp with this snap today. 

Snaps are currently only available in the development build‚ÄîMetaMask Flask‚Äîwhich developers will need to install in their browser to interact with the integration. Remember to run it in a separate browser profile from any other instance of MetaMask.

Flask is named for the fact that it is an experimental laboratory, that can be unstable or unsafe, and should be treated as such. Hence this announcement only applies to developers. End users, stay tuned for when these innovations enable direct access in the stable MetaMask extension later this year. 

StarkNet is still in alpha, and you may experience network issues during this period, along with transaction limits. Please use at your own risk.

How to Install the StarkNet Snap

  1. To get started make sure you have MetaMask Flask first and then install the StarkNet snap here.
  2. Connect with MetaMask Flask
  3. Accept the connection in MetaMask 
  4. Approve and install the StarkNet snap

Congratulations! A StarkNet account has been deployed and you can now use the StarkNet snap.

FAQ

What is a snap? 

  • A snap is a program that expands the capabilities of MetaMask. For example, a snap can add support for a non-EVM blockchain and make a custom API available to dapps.

Why do I need to use a snap for StarkNet? 

  • StarkNet is not directly compatible with MetaMask. The StarkNet snap allows you to manage assets that are on StarkNet by creating a StarkNet account based on your MetaMask Secret Recovery Phrase (SRP). 

Why do I have to use MetaMask Flask? 

  • Snaps are only available on the developer preview version of MetaMask, called MetaMask Flask. Snaps will be released within the generally available version of MetaMask later this year

Can I see my StarkNet assets directly in MetaMask Flask? 

  • No, the StarkNet Snap does not modify any UI within MetaMask Flask. To interact with the snap and perform actions you need to go through a dapp. We have built a dedicated dapp that you can access here. 

How do I add StarkNet-based ERC20 tokens? You can manage ERC-20 tokens on StarkNet by clicking ‚ÄúAdd Token‚Äù in the StarkNet Dapp and completing the form. Information about currently deployed tokens can be found here.

I have MetaMask installed, why can‚Äôt I install the Starknet snap? 

  • For now, snaps can only be installed in MetaMask Flask. You can‚Äôt run MetaMask and MetaMask Flask at the same time. Please use a different browser profile or a different browser to install Flask.

Is the StarkNet snap available on MetaMask Mobile? 

  • Snaps are currently only available on MetaMask Flask. MetaMask Flask is a browser-based developer preview of MetaMask. This means the StarkNet snap, or any other snap, is currently not available on MetaMask Mobile. 

What happens if I delete the snap in MetaMask? 

  • Reinstalling the snap will automatically recover your account. Custom tokens previously added will need to be added again. Deleting the snap does not delete your StarkNet account or transaction history.

How do I recover my account? 

  • The StarkNet snap recovery is directly leveraging MetaMask‚Äôs Secret Recovery Phrase. After recovering a MetaMask account, install the StarkNet snap and your existing account will be automatically recovered. 

How do I export my StarkNet Private Key? 

  • You can export your private key by clicking on ‚ÄúAccount details‚Äù and ‚ÄúExport Private Key‚Äù in the StarkNet dapp. A MetaMask popup will appear with your private key information.

nodes.title: How to buy crypto
nodes.subtitle: Peruse the ways MetaMask makes buying crypto speedy, simple, and secure.

image.title: How to buy crypto
image.description: Explore the ways MetaMask makes buying crypto speedy, simple, and secure.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Wondering how to buy crypto, but not sure where to start? You‚Äôve come to the right place. Buying crypto with MetaMask is swift, seamless, and safe. You can use methods like a credit card, debit card, bank account, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or PayPal. No need for centralized exchanges. We‚Äôve cut out all of the unnecessary steps ‚Äî saving you time, and money on excess fees too.

Below, we'll give you an overview of how we make MetaMask wallet powerful, secure, and configurable when you buy cryptocurrencies. Then, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you exactly how to buy crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! ü¶ä

How MetaMask empowers you when buying crypto

  • Buy crypto straight into your MetaMask wallet.
  • Choose the best quote from our industry-leading aggregator.
  • Avoid centralized exchanges, extra steps, and additional costs.
  • Use MetaMask wallet in 188 countries with over 80 currencies available.
  • Select from hundreds of your favorite tokens across 15+ networks including: Ethereum, Linea, Optimism, BNB Chain, Polygon, zkSync, Base, Arbitrum, and Avalanche.
  • Go from cash to crypto back to cash. All in one place.

How MetaMask wallet keeps you secure when buying crypto

  • Get 24/7 help whenever you need it from our expert customer service team.
  • We only work with trusted providers, ensuring that they comply with applicable regulations and are legitimate, responsible parties.
  • Preserving your privacy is paramount: MetaMask does not store ‚Äî nor do we have access to ‚Äî any personal information you provide when buying or selling crypto, such as payment details, personal data, or email addresses.
  • Unlike a centralized exchange, neither MetaMask nor our partners have access to the cryptocurrencies after you purchase or transfer them, meaning you can access your assets immediately without a holding period.

How MetaMask wallet gives you choice buying crypto

  • Choose your preferred way to buy crypto using: debit card, credit card, bank transfer, instant ACH, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Ideal, SEPA bank transfers, and alternative local payment methods. These are subject to availability based on your region.
  • Select your preferred quote and provider.
  • You can buy crypto using MetaMask Portfolio on desktop or the MetaMask app on mobile.

If you‚Äôre using MetaMask Extension:

Clicking the Buy & Sell button on the MetaMask extension will redirect you to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto
  2. Click Buy.
  3. Select your region, and currency ‚Äî located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Select payment method.
  5. Select the token and network you want to purchase on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  6. Enter the amount desired in your local currency. Example: $100 of ETH.
  7. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers.
  8. You'll be securely redirected to the provider's website to complete the purchase, and funds will be deposited in your MetaMask wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

If you‚Äôre using the MetaMask mobile app:

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Buy
  4. Select your region and currency‚Äîthis is located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Select the crypto token and network that you want to buy. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  6. Enter the crypto amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  7. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers.
  9. Complete the transaction on the provider‚Äôs portal, and link your desired payment method.
  10. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and confirm the transaction to get crypto in your wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

Ready to get started? If you‚Äôre on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you‚Äôre on mobile, download the MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Head to MetaMask Support to speak with our team of experts around-the-clock.

nodes.metaDescription: Explore the ways to buy crypto directly using your debit card, credit card, PayPal, and bank account with MetaMask wallet.

nodes.title: How to sell crypto
nodes.subtitle: Discover the ways MetaMask makes selling crypto easy, quick, and safe.

image.title: How to sell crypto with MetaMask
image.description: MetaMask makes selling cryptocurrencies fast, easy, and secure. With low fees and seamless off-ramping.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Selling crypto for cash is as simple as can be with MetaMask. You can exchange crypto from MetaMask wallet directly to your debit card, credit card, PayPal, or bank account. No unnecessary steps, no excess fees, no worries.

Below, we'll give you an overview of how we make MetaMask wallet powerful, secure, and configurable when you sell cryptocurrencies. Then, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you how to sell crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! ü¶ä

How MetaMask empowers you when selling crypto

  • Sell directly from your wallet, and send cash to the place that works for you.
  • Choose the best quote from our industry-leading aggregator.
  • Avoid centralized exchanges, extra steps, and additional costs.
  • Select your country, and choose from a range of available payment methods.
  • Buy crypto, use crypto, and sell crypto. All in one place.

How MetaMask wallet keeps you secure when selling crypto

  • Get 24/7 help whenever you need it from our expert customer service team.
  • We only work with trusted providers, ensuring that they comply with applicable regulations and are legitimate, responsible parties.
  • Preserving your privacy is paramount: MetaMask does not store ‚Äî nor do we have access to ‚Äî any personal information you provide when buying or selling crypto, such as payment details, personal data, or email addresses.
  • Unlike a centralized exchange, neither MetaMask nor our partners have access to the cryptocurrencies after you purchase or transfer them, meaning you can access your assets immediately without a holding period.

How MetaMask wallet gives you choice when selling crypto

  • Choose your preferred destination for your cash: debit card, credit card, bank transfer, or PayPal account.
  • Select your preferred quote and provider available in your region.
  • Sell crypto using MetaMask Portfolio on desktop or the MetaMask app on mobile.

Buy crypto with MetaMask Extension



Click the Buy & Sell button on MetaMask extension to redirect to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto.
  2. Click Sell.
  3. Select your region, and currency ‚Äî located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Enter the amount of crypto that you want to sell. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  5. Select the account destination you want. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  6. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers. You'll be securely redirected to the provider‚Äôs website where you may have to share KYC, then directed back to MetaMask Portfolio once you accept the quote.
  7. Return to MetaMask Portfolio and click Send ETH.
  8. Click Confirm to complete the transaction in your MetaMask wallet.

Note: You can click on Sell to keep track of your order as it is processed. Times may vary depending on provider.

Success! ü¶ä

Buy crypto with MetaMask app



  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap on the menu button‚Äö which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Sell.
  4. Select your region and currency‚Äîthis is located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Enter the crypto amount you want to sell. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  6. Tap Send your cash to and select the account destination you want. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal. Availability will depend on your region.
  7. Tap Get quotes to proceed.
  8. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers. You'll be securely redirected to the provider‚Äôs portal, where you may have to share KYC, then directed back to MetaMask app once you accept the quote.
  9. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and tap Confirm to complete the transaction.

Note: You can tap on progress notification to keep track of your order as it is processed. Times may vary depending on provider.

Success! ü¶ä

Ready to get started? If you‚Äôre on a desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you‚Äôre on mobile, download the MetaMask app in the Apple Store or Google Store.

Need more help? We got you. Head to MetaMask Support to speak with our team of experts around-the-clock.

nodes.metaDescription: Sell crypto for cash directly to your debit card, credit card, PayPal, or bank account with MetaMask wallet.

nodes.title: Transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available in MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

image.title: Centralized exchange transfers MetaMask now available
image.description: Centralized exchange transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available on MetaMask.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio now supports centralized exchange (CEX) transfers from Coinbase and Binance, streamlining the process of transferring assets to your crypto wallet.

Many web3 users have digital assets divided across multiple wallets and accounts, creating a fragmented experience. Moving assets from one platform to another can be overly complicated and involve many steps‚Äîfraught with the risks of copying and pasting addresses incorrectly, and potential security concerns. MetaMask‚Äôs new CEX transfer feature is a solution to this issue, making your wallet more powerful, while also strengthening security.

Instant transfer of assets from centralized exchanges into your MetaMask wallet

MetaMask CEX transfers allow you to immediately move assets between accounts, eliminating the need for manually entering addresses. And, if you have bank accounts linked to your Coinbase or Binance accounts, purchasing crypto directly with your bank account to your MetaMask wallet has never been easier. No additional KYC necessary.

In April 2024, MetaMask partnered with Meld and Mesh to launch a feature that allowed users to track external CEX balances by linking Coinbase or Binance accounts directly from the MetaMask Portfolio dashboard. Now, you can view CEX balances, and also transfer assets from these exchanges into your MetaMask wallet. Neither MetaMask, nor our partners in this integration, will ever have access to your exchange login credentials, or share your wallet addresses with third parties.

CEX transfers will initially support Coinbase or Binance accounts, with expansion to additional exchanges on the horizon. No fees will be charged when transferring digital assets from exchanges to MetaMask. A nominal transaction fee of 0.25% will be applied when transferring from MetaMask to centralized exchanges. Network gas fees also apply.

By bridging the gap between self-custodial and centralized platforms, MetaMask is paving the way for a more powerful, integrated, and user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Head to MetaMask Portfolio today to get started with CEX transfers.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.
